basics.name: Stallone Fernandes
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: A 23 Year Old Software Engineer With A Passion For Building Scalable , Efficient And Visually Appealing Software Solutions. I Graduated From Chandigarh University, Where I Honed My Skills In Software Development And Gained Valuable Experience In Various Technologies.

jobs.summary: Developed And Implemented Web Scraping Solutions To Efficiently Gather And Provide Valuable Data To The Team.
highlights: Designed And Automated Automated Scripts In Python To Srape And Extract Candidates' Data From Various Online Sources.
Processed And Analyzed The Data To Identify Relevant Candidates.
Developed And Implemented A Web Scraping Solution To Gather And Process Data From Various Online Sources.

jobs.summary: Built The FrontEnd Architecture Of Gruby's Landing Page And Admin Panel.
highlights: Designed And Built The FrontEnd Architecture Of Gruby's Landing Page And Admin Panel, Ensuring Responsiveness Sclability And Cross Browser Compatibility.
Collaborated With The UI/UX Designers To Translate Wireframes And Mockups Into Production Code.
Integrated FrontEnd Components With The Backend APIs Ensuring Seamless Data Flow And Integration.
